user_query: I'm planning to invest in the stock market and I need the IEX-listed securities that have an aggregate fail to deliver position for five consecutive settlement days for the stock symbol 'NVDA' from the Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading API. Can you fetch me the 24 hours trading data for all available markets on QuantaEx Market Data?

TaskList.description: Fetch the aggregate fail to deliver position for the stock symbol 'NVDA' over five consecutive settlement days from the Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading API.
Retrieve the 24 hours trading data for all available markets from QuantaEx Market Data.
